TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Reflection.Assembly ResolveEventHandler(object sender, ResolveEventArgs args);
.class public auto ansi serializable sealed ResolveEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function ResolveEventHandler(sender As Object, args As ResolveEventArgs) As Assembly
public delegate System::Reflection::Assembly ^ ResolveEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, ResolveEventArgs ^ args);
type ResolveEventHandler = delegate of obj * ResolveEventArgs -> Assembly

summary.span: 表示處理 之 、 或 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents a method that handles the , , or event of an .

returns.span: 用來解析型別、組件或資源的組件，如果無法解析組件則為 。

span.span: The assembly that resolves the type, assembly, or resource; or if the assembly cannot be resolved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果執行階段類別載入器無法解析的參考組件、 類型或資源，對應的事件會引發，讓回呼告知執行階段參考的組件、 類型或資源是在哪個組件。If the runtime class loader cannot resolve a reference to an assembly, type, or resource, the corresponding events are raised to give the callback a chance to tell the runtime which assembly the referenced assembly, type, or resource is in. 它負責傳回型別、 組件或資源解析的組件，或如果無法辨識的組件傳回 null。It is the responsibility of the to return the assembly that resolves the type, assembly, or resource, or to return null if the assembly is not recognized. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 解析組件載入](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md)並， ，和事件。For more information, see [Resolving Assembly Loads](~/docs/framework/app-domains/resolve-assembly-loads.md) and the , , and events. > [!IMPORTANT] > 開頭[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，則所有組件，包括資源組件都會引發事件。Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the event is raised for all assemblies, including resource assemblies. 在舊版中，資源組件不引發事件。In earlier versions, the event was not raised for resource assemblies. 如果當地語系化的作業系統，可能會呼叫處理常式多次： 每個文化特性後援鏈結中的一次。If the operating system is localized, the handler might be called multiple times: once for each culture in the fallback chain. 每個衍生的類別並的建構函式和`Invoke`方法。Every derived class of and has a constructor and an `Invoke` method. C + + 程式碼範例中的描述，請參閱類別。See the C++ code example in the description for the class.
